name: In His Footsteps
description:
This is my Extra Credits Game Jam #5 Submission. Inside the file you download for the game you will find a PDF of the journal of the late, great Sir Jeremy Fredrick Esq. III. Use it to help you solve the cryptic puzzles inside the Rexta Direct and fulfill his final wish. 

Credits

Art

"Open Book" by Min licensed CC0: https://opengameart.org/content/open-book-0

Music

"When I'm Gone" by FrenchyBoy licensed CC0: https://opengameart.org/content/when-im-gone
"Time to Puzzle it Up!" by Spring lincensed CC0: https://opengameart.org/content/time-to-puzzle-it-up
"Ending Song" by FrenchyBoy licensed CC0: https://opengameart.org/content/ending-song
